title: Northcote Avenue, Caringbah South
content: This full home renovation in Caringbah South was designed to transform an existing residence into a bright, welcoming home tailored for everyday living and entertaining. The brief focused on maximising natural light, improving functionality and creating an open-plan layout that connects seamlessly to the outdoors. The design approach centred on clarity of layout and connection between spaces. By reconfiguring the floor plan, the main living, dining and kitchen areas were brought together into a cohesive zone that opens directly onto a generous outdoor area. Large glass doors enhance daylight penetration and establish a strong indoor–outdoor relationship, supporting a relaxed and social way of living. The kitchen was designed as the heart of the home, combining sleek white cabinetry with warm timber accents to achieve a balanced and timeless aesthetic. Handle-less detailing and integrated appliances reinforce a streamlined appearance, allowing the space to remain visually calm and highly functional. Bathrooms were upgraded with a refined yet contemporary material palette. Marble-look porcelain tiles provide a soft, elegant foundation, while black penny round tiles were introduced within niches to add texture and contrast. Floating vanities and minimalist fixtures complete the spaces, creating bathrooms that feel both calming and modern. Large-format earthy tiles were selected to run throughout the home, bringing warmth, durability and visual cohesion across all living areas. This consistent flooring choice anchors the interior and enhances the sense of continuity from room to room. The completed renovation delivers a home that feels light, comfortable and easy to live in. Through thoughtful spatial planning, cohesive material selection and strong indoor–outdoor connections, the Northcote Avenue Residence reflects Inhaus Living’s approach to full home renovation, considered, functional and designed to support modern family life.
